------------
Introduction
------------

`medialog.hidetitle` is a simple package that adds an option to hide the content items title and description 
see screenshots here: http://products.medialog.no/hidetitle-1

Warning: you will need to edit already added content if you add this on an old site.
So, if http://mysite/front-page gives you an error, you will have to go to http://mysite/front-page/edit and save it.
(recatalog is not working, send espen at medialog dot no a mail if you have a suggestion on how to solve this problem)
